channel.title: Comments on: St. Petersburg in the rain

item.title: By: tamara
item.dc:creator: tamara
item.description:
Wow that cathedral is amazing, it reminds me of a church i visited in sweden. One thing i was pondering the past few days of reading your posts, you've mentioned nothing of language issues (or i missed it). It seems like you're getting by ok though?
Hope you get more sunshine soon! Tamara
item.content:encoded:
Wow that cathedral is amazing, it reminds me of a church i visited in sweden. One thing i was pondering the past few days of reading your posts, you’ve mentioned nothing of language issues (or i missed it). It seems like you’re getting by ok though?

Hope you get more sunshine soon!
Tamara
